caption: This video is about a story of visiting a friend. The friend brought something for the latter and went to the cinema with him. The latter seemed a bit confused because he had never been to a cinema before. The friend brought something for the latter, and went to the cinema with him. The latter seemed a bit confused, because he had never been to the cinema before. The friend explained what a cinema is, and clarified that they were going to see a movie. The latter asked why it was his first time going to the cinema, the friend said he thought the latter would be interested in this movie. They started watching the movie, and the latter seemed uninterested in the film, the friend tried to explain the plot, but the latter didn't understand. In the movie, there was a scene where people were robbing a bank, which the latter found boring. When a car appeared in the movie, the friend reminded the latter to avoid touching the wheels, but the latter didnâ€™t care. The latter found the plot of the movie similar to real-life situations, he became interested, but the friend didn't think so. The latter tried to explain the plot of the movie, but the friend didn't understand. In the end, the friend found the movie interesting, but the latter thought it was boring.
